By selling a total of 40% quality worth of gems with a specific tag (such as fire) together with a Wand, Sceptre, Rune Dagger or Staff you will be rewarded with a weapon with a +1 GLOBAL level to ALL tagged spell gems. This is a powerful caster weapon early in the endgame.

Their powerful effects aside high currencies act as trade goods for players. Chaos Orbs and Divine Orbs are pretty much the standard way to pay for most trades. These are desired drops and it's almost always recommended to pick them up.
除了它們強大的效果外，高等級通貨還可作為玩家的交易商品。混沌石和神聖石幾乎是支付大多數交易的標準方式。這些是理想的掉落物，幾乎總是建議撿起它們。

The site is updated every 4 hours and the tiering of the items may differ. Items might change their tier based on high or low demand. Note that you have to redownload/sync the filter to get the latest economy data!
網站每 4 小時更新一次，物品的分級可能會有所不同。物品可能會根據需求高低而變更其等級。請注意，您必須重新下載/同步過濾器才能取得最新的經濟資料！
Don't underrate chance orbs! You can buy maps from Kirac at the start of the league to quickly progress through the atlas!

也可以透過進行商人配方來可靠地獲得改造石、珠寶匠的稜鏡和幻色石。

相當常見，但除非大量出售，否則不會太貴。通常用於基本工藝。

練等時掉落的有用通貨。這些規則優先於普通通貨規則，但僅適用於等級 68 以下的區域。非常適合新賽季！

It should be noted that other items without the white background can be just as, if not more valuable. However, with other items it often comes down to mods, luck and crafting, while the white background items are pretty much always great!
應該注意的是，其他沒有白色背景的物品可能具有相同或更高的價值。然而，對於其他物品，它通常取決於詞綴、運氣和工藝，而白色背景物品幾乎總是很好！

All top tier items have the same white background and drop-sound. They also come with a red beam and a huge red star on the minimap. These items include top tier currencies, valuable uniques, great divination cards, reliquary keys and everything else that is worth a LOT.
所有 T0 階物品都具有相同的白色背景和掉落音效。它們還帶有紅色光束和小地圖上的巨大紅色星星。這些物品包括 T0 階通貨、有價值的傳奇物品、很棒的命運卡、鑰匙以及其他所有值得的東西。
You can find gold all throughout the game. It's picked up automatically as you walk over it.
您可以在整個遊戲中找到黃金。當您走過它時，它會自動撿起。
金司馬金幣 - 無堆疊
金司馬金幣 - 中型堆疊
Current League: 3.26 Secrets of the Atlas
目前賽季：3.26 地圖集的秘密
Maps influenced by the originator of the atlas have enhanced rewards, difficulty and special challenges!
受到地圖集開創者影響的地圖具有增強的獎勵、難度和特殊挑戰！
Disabled starting with Uber Plus Strict
從Uber Plus Strict超級嚴格開始停用
Memory Stranded gear identifies with better modtiers and the strands can be consumed to empower crating outcomes!
記憶絲縷裝備具有更好的詞綴等級，並且可以增強工藝結果！
Filterblade tiering is based on the ingame economy. It's a good practice to update the filter weekly.
Filterblade 分級基於遊戲內經濟。每週更新過濾器是一個好習慣。
The economy  sometimes has large meta-shifts! A cheap unique can become very expensive very fast (or vice versa)!
經濟有時會發生巨大的元轉移！便宜的傳奇物品可能會很快變得非常昂貴（反之亦然）！

There are hundreds of uniques! Some are in high demand, others are worthless or very niche. The filter can't distinguish between uniques with the same baseType. Bases with a blue or purple beam/map icon could potentially be very expensive.
有數百種傳奇物品！有些需求量很高，有些則毫無價值或非常小眾。過濾器無法區分具有相同基礎類型的傳奇物品。具有藍色或紫色光束/地圖圖示的基礎類型可能非常昂貴。
25% chance to Ignite with Melee Weapons
近戰武器有 25% 機率點燃
(60-90)% increased Damage with Ignite from Melee Weapons
(60-90)% 增加來自近戰武器的點燃傷害
傳奇物品（可隱藏的垃圾）
Generally speaking the purple icon is used for the items with a higher chance to be good. On top of that the small blue stars are usually indicative of a basetypes with good boss-drops.
一般來說，紫色圖示用於更有可能成為好物品的物品。最重要的是，小藍星通常表示具有良好boss掉落物的基礎類型。

The blue or purple map icons and beams signalize that are drop CAN be quite valuable... if you're lucky. A unique  Leather Belt can very very rarely be an expensive headhunter and the filter can't tell them apart.
藍色或紫色地圖圖示和光束表示掉落物可能非常有價值......如果您幸運的話。一件傳奇的皮革腰帶很少會成為昂貴的獵首，並且過濾器無法區分它們。
6-15% 增加發現物品的稀有度
Most fragments can also be added onto a map to increase it's quantity, if you're not interested in the encounter itself. This is commonly done with sacrifice fragments.
大多數碎片也可以新增到地圖上以增加其數量。這通常是使用紅門碎片完成的。
Map fragment open a unique encounter if used if the other pieces of the set. Most scarabs on the other hand add both challenge and reward to a map encounter. Some of these can be very pricy!
大多數聖甲蟲都會為地圖遭遇增加挑戰和獎勵。其中一些可能會非常昂貴！

Divination cards grant you a specific item reward upon completing the set. Each card type drops in specific zones or by specific enemies, allowing players to farm them (although some cards can be super rare regardless).
命運卡會授予您特定的物品獎勵。每種卡片都會在特定區域或由特定敵人掉落，允許玩家農它們（有些卡片非常稀有）。
The divination card economy is quite volatile. Periodically returning to FilterBlade and redownloading the latest filter is recommended to stay up-to-date.
命運卡經濟非常不穩定。建議定期返回 FilterBlade 並重新下載最新的過濾器以保持最新狀態。
Divination Cards have vastly different price and rarity ranges and are tiered based on their value.
命運卡具有截然不同的價格和稀有度範圍，並且根據其價值進行分級。
Quality on gems influences each gem in a different way. Consult the wiki for details.
寶石上的品質會以不同的方式影響每個寶石。
Quality gems can be sold in bulk to NPCs to get gemcutter prisms
高品質寶石可以大量出售給 NPC 以獲得寶石匠的稜鏡

Note that you can corrupt a skillgem for a chance to receive extra gemlevels. This way you can create level 21 gems. You can also sell a level 20 gem and a gemcutter Prisms to receive a level 1 20% quality gem.
請注意，您可以汙染技能寶石以獲得額外的寶石等級。這樣您就可以建立 21 級寶石。您也可以出售 20 級的輔助寶石和 1 顆寶石匠的稜鏡以獲得 1 級 20% 品質的寶石。
Note: random non-quality skillgems are hidden on higher strictnesses, since they can be purachased from an NPC.
注意：隨機的非品質技能寶石會在更高的嚴格度下隱藏，因為它們可以從 NPC 購買。
Currently expensive gems are highlighted by the filter. Additionally the filter will highlight gems with special properties, such as higher levels, quality etc.
目前昂貴的寶石會被過濾器突出顯示。此外，過濾器將突出顯示具有特殊屬性的寶石，例如更高的等級、品質等。
寶石匠配方中等品質寶石
寶石匠配方低品質寶石

寶石上的品質會以不同的方式影響每個寶石。詳情請查閱維基百科以了解詳細資訊。

Note that you can corrupt a skillgem for a chance to receive extra gemlevels. This way you can create level 21 gems. You can also sell a level 20 gem and a gemcutter Prisms to receive a level 1 20% quality gem.
請注意，您可以汙染技能寶石以獲得額外的寶石等級。這樣您就可以創造 21 級寶石。您也可以出售 20 級寶石和寶石匠的稜鏡以獲得 1 級 20% 品質的寶石。
Maps gain more highlight as they gain tiers. High tier (11+) and top tier (16) maps have different sounds. The filter highlights map tier upgrades with an extra color.
地圖隨著階級的提高而獲得更多的篩選顯示。高等級 (11+) 和頂級 (16) 地圖具有不同的聲音。過濾器會以額外的顏色突出顯示地圖階級升級。
The filter highlights map drops of a higher tier than the one you're in with extra highlight (disabled on some styles)
過濾器會以額外的篩選顯示突出顯示比您所在的階級更高的地圖掉落物（在某些樣式中停用）
Unique maps are treated like any other unique and are highlighted based on price.
傳奇地圖的處理方式與任何其他傳奇物品相同，並根據價格突出顯示。

Rare items can be crazy strong. That being said it's very tedious to pick, identify and treat (sell/price/keep) rare items. It takes a lot of practice and knowledge to quickly price rare items and there's a lot of factors, such as league type, age, meta, itemlevel, that affects it.
稀有物品可能非常強大。 也就是說，要拾取、鑑定和處理（出售/定價/保留）稀有物品非常繁瑣。 需要大量的練習和知識才能快速為稀有物品定價，並且有很多因素會影響它，例如賽季類型、時間、版本、物品等級。

Many Players also choose to use rares for the 'Chaos Recipe'. This is a safe and consistent way to make currency, especially early on in the league. For that you need to sell a full equipment of rares (boots, gloves, helm, 2 rings, 1 amulet, belt, armor, weapon+shield or a 2h weapon) of itemlevel 60+ (found in act 9 or later). The vendor will reward you with a Chaos Orb. If all items are unidentified, he'll give you 2 Chaos Orbs.
許多玩家也選擇使用稀有物品進行「混沌石配方」。 這是一種安全且一致的賺取通貨的方式，尤其是在賽季初期。 為此，您需要出售一套完整的稀有裝備（鞋子、手套、頭盔、2 個戒指、1 個護身符、腰帶、胸甲、武器+盾牌或 2h 武器），物品等級 60+（在第九章或之後找到）。 供應商將獎勵您一顆混沌石。 如果所有物品都未鑑定，他會給你 2 顆混沌石。
of a rare item describes its
- the relative usefulness of the item in the current meta. Opaque or colorful backgrounds are better.
- 該物品在當前版本中的相對有用性。 不透明或彩色背景更好。
: Tiny items have a green, small items a white and big items a black border. Corrupted items come with a red border.
: 微小的物品有綠色邊框，小的物品有白色邊框，大的物品有黑色邊框。 腐化物品帶有紅色邊框。
is orange, instead of yellow, if the
is 75 or above, meaning that you can use the item for the Regal recipe instead of the chaos one.
為 75 或以上，則為橙色而不是黃色，這意味著您可以使用該物品進行帝王石配方而不是混沌石配方。
Gain 14 Mana per Enemy Hit with Attacks
每次攻擊擊中敵人時獲得 14 點魔力
Gain 38 Life per Enemy Hit by Attacks
每次攻擊擊中敵人時獲得 38 點生命

- 終局稀有裝飾 4 連接：邊框

在高階地圖中隱藏較低的稀有度物品 4

'Rare accessories' are a fairly common drop, but they are tiny and most builds cover their stats and resists through rare accessories. This makes these rares a much more lucrative pick-ups than non-accessoires rares. On top of that they are usually the bottleneck for chaos recipes.
「稀有飾品」是一種相當常見的掉落物，但它們很小，並且大多數流派都通過稀有飾品來覆蓋其屬性和抗性。 這使得這些稀有物品比非飾品稀有物品更有利可圖。 最重要的是，它們通常是混沌石配方的瓶頸。

The green background indicates that the rare has a good base. All rares of the itemlevel and class can roll the same mods, but many items require a good base to be useful to begin with (especially weapons).
綠色背景表示該稀有物品具有良好的底材。 物品等級和類別的所有稀有物品都可以洗出相同的詞綴，但是許多物品首先需要一個良好的底材才能有用（尤其是武器）。
These rares are popular in the current meta and are often small pickups. Getting the right stats on these makes them quite valuable.
這些稀有物品在當前版本中很受歡迎，而且通常是小的拾取物。 在這些物品上獲得正確的屬性使它們非常有價值。
Quite good rares, that are just a few steps away from being top bases. These include several handpicked T2-T3 bases.
非常好的稀有物品，距離頂級底材僅幾步之遙。 這些包括幾個精心挑選的 T2-T3 底材。
- 終局稀有裝飾大型：邊框

Technically one can spend the time to identify every single rare, however this is fairly time consuming and also increasingly annoying for most players. Even T3/T4 rares can be quite amazing. Yet it's a safer investment of time to focus on higher rares, at least if your build is sufficiently fast and you're not playing SSF/HC.
從技術上講，一個人可以花時間鑑定每個稀有物品，但是這非常耗時，並且對大多數玩家來說也越來越煩人。 即使是 T3/T4 稀有物品也可能非常出色。 但是，將時間集中在更高的稀有度上是一種更安全的投資，至少如果您的流派速度足夠快並且您沒有玩 SSF/HC。
Often very high basetypes, yet very niche in the meta or lower tier meta bases. Not worth picking up later in the league, once you have some decent gear.
通常是非常高的底材類型，但在版本中非常小眾或底層底材版本。 一旦您有了一些像樣的裝備，就不值得在賽季後期撿起來了。
- 終局稀有裝飾中型 1：邊框

A chaos recipe is selling a full “set” of rare items to a vendor - One amulet, two rings, one chest armor, etc… at the same time. The vendor will reward you with one Chaos Orb if all items are itemlevel 60+.
一個混沌石配方是將一整套“套裝”稀有物品賣給供應商 - 一個護身符、兩個戒指、一個胸甲等……同時進行。 如果所有物品的物品等級都為 60+，則供應商將獎勵您一顆混沌石。

If all items are unidentified, you’ll receive two Chaos Orbs instead. If all items are unidentified and have 20% quality, you’ll get three Chaos Orbs. If all items have an itemlevel of 75+, you’ll get Regal Orbs instead.
如果所有物品都未鑑定，您將收到兩顆混沌石作為替代。 如果所有物品都未鑑定並且具有 20% 品質，您將獲得三顆混沌石。 如果所有物品的物品等級為 75+，您將獲得帝王石作為替代。
These items are usually rendered fairly unattractive due to their size, weak basetypes or unpopular type. They're good candidates for the chaos recipe though.
較弱的底材或不受歡迎的類型，這些物品通常看起來相當沒有吸引力。 不過，它們是混沌石配方的良好候選者。
+22% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff
+22% 持杖格擋攻擊傷害機率

As a general rule of thumb a shaper/elder item needs at least level 80 to be useful, often higher. In particular itemlevel 86+ top bases tend to be expensive. The filter attempts to detect expensive bases, based on the economy data, but economy and meta changes can lead to it being outdated fairly quickly. It's recommended to update the filter at least once every few weeks and to be careful with the influenced drops.
作為一般規則，塑界者/尊師物品至少需要 80 級才能有用，通常更高。 尤其是 86+ 物品等級的頂級底材往往很昂貴。 過濾器會嘗試根據經濟數據檢測昂貴的底材，但是經濟和版本變化可能會導致其很快過時。 建議至少每隔幾週更新一次過濾器，並小心受勢力影響的掉落物。

These items drop from influenced maps in the endgame. They come with their own exclusive set of mods. High level versions of these items on certain basetypes can be very valuable and are great crafting bases.
這些物品從終局中受勢力影響的地圖中掉落。 它們帶有自己獨有的詞綴集。 某些底材上這些物品的高等級版本可能非常有價值，並且是出色的工藝底材。

Generic jewels come in 3 types: red, green and blue. The red ones have affinities towards rolling melee mods and physical defense, green ones focus on bows, daggers, evasion etc and blue ones focus on spellcasters, energy shield and minions.
通用珠寶分為三種類型：紅色、綠色和藍色。 紅色珠寶傾向於洗出近戰詞綴和物理防禦，綠色珠寶專注於弓、匕首、迴避等，藍色珠寶專注於法術者、能量護盾和召喚物。
A particularly valuable corruption result is the 'corrupting blood cannot be inflicted on you' implicit.
一個特別有價值的腐化結果是「無法對你造成腐化之血」的詞綴。
Jewels with 3+ crit damage multipliers and/or a life roll tend to be extremely valuable.
具有 3 個以上暴擊傷害加成和/或生命值的珠寶往往極為有價值。

Jewel sockets are an important part of most builds. Generic jewels with life or energy shield and a bunch of damage mods tend to be quite expensive. The itemlevel does not matter on generic jewels. Corruptions can grants strong implicits on jewels.
珠寶插槽是大多數流派的重要組成部分。 具有生命或能量護盾以及一堆傷害詞綴的通用珠寶往往非常昂貴。 物品等級對通用珠寶沒有影響。 腐化可以賦予珠寶強大的詞綴。
深淵珠寶 稀有 物品等級 86
深淵珠寶 稀有 物品等級 82

Murderous eye jewels focus on strength based attack builds, such as most melee builds, searching eyes benefit dexterity based attacks builds, hypnotic eye jewels have spellcaster mods and ghastly eye jewels on minion builds.
殺戮之眼珠寶專注於基於力量的攻擊流派，例如大多數近戰流派，勘查之眼有利於基於敏捷的攻擊流派，催眠之眼珠寶具有法術者詞綴，而極懼之眼珠寶則用於召喚流派。
Generic jewels roll percentual life and defenses, while abyss jewels mostly focus on flat mod bonuses.
通用珠寶洗出百分比生命和防禦，而深淵珠寶主要專注於固定數值詞綴加成。
Abyss Jewels can be socketed into the tree or abyssal sockets in items. They come in 4 versions and roll better mods on high itemlevels.
深淵珠寶可以插在天賦樹或物品上的深淵插槽中。 它們有 4 個版本，並在高物品等級下洗出更好的詞綴。
Cluster jewels are a huge power source for many builds. Large jewels mostly focus on damage boosts, medium once on utility and small ones on defenses, auras and curses.
星團珠寶是許多流派的巨大提升來源。 大型珠寶主要側重於傷害提升，中型珠寶側重於功能性，小型珠寶側重於防禦、光環和詛咒。
High level jewels with optimum node counts can be extremely valuable. If your filter is up to date, it will attempt to highlight expensive combinations.
具有最佳節點數量的高等級珠寶可能極為有價值。 如果您的過濾器是最新的，它將嘗試突出顯示昂貴的組合。
Some builds choose to run jewels with more nodes instead of smaller ones, to maximize the stat boosts. This is typical for minion and reservation jewels.
一些流派選擇運行具有更多小點的珠寶而不是更少小點的珠寶，以最大程度地提高屬性提升。 這對於召喚和保留珠寶來說是典型的。
Cluster jewels are delirium exclusive drops, that can expand the skilltree in exclusive ways. Itemlevel matters on them. They come in 3 sizes.
星團珠寶是譫妄聯盟的限定掉落物，可以以獨特的方式擴展技能樹。 物品等級對它們很重要。 它們有 3 種尺寸。
The Jeweller's Orb recipe is one of the most useful recipes ingame and are extremely useful, until you're very well geared and wealthy.
珠寶匠的稜鏡配方是遊戲中最有用的配方之一，並且非常有用，直到您的裝備和財富都很好為止。

Hint: You can buy fusing orbs for 1:4 jeweller orbs from vendors. You can sell those in large quantities for a steady profit. This is a good and steady income source, especially if you're rather new to the game.
提示：您可以從供應商處以 1:4 的比例購買鏈結石。 您可以大量出售它們以獲得穩定的利潤。 這是一個良好且穩定的收入來源，特別是如果您是遊戲新手。
Items with 6 sockets can be sold at any vendor for 7 Jeweller's Orbs.
具有 6 個插槽的物品可以以 7 個工匠石的價格出售給任何供應商。
工匠配方 6 插槽（大型）

Small items like Wands or Boots have additional highlighting for the recipe because the reward of it is always the same, no matter the item size. As your build gets faster you might want to disable this highlight, as you might have enough chromatics at this point.
像魔杖或靴子這樣的小型物品，由於配方的獎勵始終相同，因此會額外突出顯示，無論物品大小。 隨著您的流派變得更快，您可能希望禁用此突出顯示，因為此時您可能擁有足夠的幻色石。
All red-green-blue linked items sell for exactly one Chromatic Orb. It's more efficient to pick up smaller RGB-items for this recipe.
所有紅-綠-藍連接的物品都正好以一顆幻色石出售。 對於此配方，拾取較小的 RGB 物品更有效率。
In the endgame, large RGB items are hidden to maximize efficiency.
在終局遊戲中，大型 RGB 物品會被隱藏以最大程度地提高效率。
RGB 幻色石配方 終局 小型 1x3
Selling a 20% gavel together with any map will award you with a Cartographer's Chisel. This recipe is rather low profit and not recommended by most players.
將 20% 品質的堅錘與任何地圖一起出售將獎勵您一個製圖師的六分儀。 該配方的利潤很低，不建議大多數玩家使用。
Quality on flasks is VERY important. It increases the HP recovery on life flasks and increases the duration of utility flasks. These subtle boosts sum up into major differences over time.
藥劑的品質非常重要。 它可以提高生命藥劑的生命恢復量，並增加功能性藥劑的持續時間。 這些細微的提升總和起來會隨著時間的推移而產生重大差異。
When applying quality, you get 5% quality if used on normal rarity flasks, 2% on magic and 1% on unique flasks.
當應用品質時，如果在普通稀有度藥劑上使用，您將獲得 5% 品質，在魔法藥劑上使用 2%，在傳奇藥劑上使用 1%。
Selling a 20% quality flask or many flasks with a total of 40% quality will grant you a Glassblower's Bauble. This recipe can be quite useful at the beginning of a new league.
出售 20% 品質的藥劑或許多總共具有 40% 品質的藥劑將獎勵您一個玻璃彈珠。 該配方在賽季初期非常有用。
玻璃彈珠配 方頂級品質
There’s a lot to add here. First of all, chancing is a very controversial thing in Path of Exile. Many players don’t believe it’s worth the time or effort.
這裡有很多要補充的。 首先，點機會石是流亡黯道中一個非常有爭議的事情。 許多玩家不相信它值得花費時間或精力。
Further, the itemlevel or quality does not matter while chancing (example: you can chance a low itemlevel Gold Ring into an Andvarius, even if Andvarius regulary only starts dropping later on).
此外，點機會石時物品等級或品質無關緊要。

Another interesting detail is that you can only chance non-drop-restricted uniques. Things that can only be obtained by boss drops, such as Shaper and Atziri drops, can not be chanced. The success chance depends on the unique. Chancing something common might work out with just a dozen of orbs, while getting a headhunter can easily require ten thousands of orbs.
另一個有趣的細節是，您只能點機會石非掉落限制的傳奇物品。 只能通過首領掉落獲得的東西，例如塑界者和阿茲里的掉落物，都不能點機會石。 成功機率取決於傳奇物品。 點普通物品可能只需要十幾個機會石，而獲得獵首則很容易需要更多(非常))。
By applying an 'Orb of Chance' on these bases, you have a tiny chance to turn it into valuable unique item.
通過在這些底材上應用「機會石」，您有很小的機會將其變成有價值的傳奇物品。
The inherent base defenses on every item vary by up to 15%. Selected itemLevel 86 items with perfect defense rolls get a special highlight. These bases are great for crafting.
每個物品的固有基礎防禦力變化高達 15%。 具有完美防禦的選定物品等級 86 的物品會獲得特殊突出顯示。 這些底材非常適合工藝。
低階 普通工藝底材 T1
Exotic basetypes, such as atlas bases. Come in 3 itemlevel subsections (86/84/others). These can be quite expensive at ilvl 86+
特殊底材。 分為 3 個物品等級子部分 (86/84/其他)。 這些在物品等級 86+ 時可能非常昂貴
低階 普通工藝底材 T2
#	稀有度 普通 魔法 稀有

Due to all the special bases (such as atlas, stygian, shaper, elder bases) being added to the game, these bases have become much less popular and a lot of them are hidden on higher filter strictnesses.
由於所有特殊底材都已添加到遊戲中，因此這些底材已變得不那麼受歡迎，並且其中許多底材在更高的過濾器嚴格度下被隱藏。
Still, especially in SSF and early leagues, these bases can be fairly valuable.
儘管如此，尤其是在自力和賽季初期，這些底材可能相當有價值。
Popular best base-items for crafting. Often expensive at the start of the league, at itemlevel 86+. Works for normal-rare rarities. Come in 3 itemlevel subsections (86/84/others).
流行的最佳工藝底材物品。 在賽季初期通常很昂貴，物品等級為 86+。 適用於普通-稀有稀有度。 分為 3 個物品等級子部分 (86/84/其他)。
低階 普通工藝底材 T3
Additional less commonly used crafting bases
額外較少使用的工藝底材

Any item with a teal highlight has something special about it! Typical reasons are: enchants, fractured, synthesis, identified mods, incursion mods, delve mods, abyss sockets etc. Their price differs and it often requires a manual check.
任何具有青色篩選的物品都有一些特別之處！ 通常需要手動檢查。
Synthesed items have a special implicit. Some implicits like +1 frenzy charges or curses on hit can be in very high demand.
追憶物品具有特殊的詞。 諸如 +1 狂怒球或擊中時施放詛咒之類。
Fractured items have a permanent mod that can't be removed or changed. These make for good crafting bases, especially when combined with eldritch currency.
破裂物品具有無法移除或更改的永久詞綴。 這些物品是很好的工藝底材，尤其是在與 Eldritch 通貨結合使用時。
Some items in the game can only be obtained from limited sources. Such bases can be valuable.
遊戲中的某些物品只能從有限的來源獲得。 這樣的底材可能很有價值。
Some veiled items, like 'Elreon's Veil' tend to be expensive every league. It should be noted that the natural unveil can be very powerful and is stronger than the crafted version of the mod.
一些隱匿物品，應該注意的是，自然解鎖的詞綴可能非常強大，並且比工藝版本的詞綴更強。
Veiled mods can be 'unveiled' by Jun and become permanent mods + you learn to craft that mod. Member-Specific and small veiled items receive extra highlight!
成員專用和小型隱匿物品會收到額外突出顯示！
Some items in the game can only be obtained from limited sources. Such bases can be valuable.
遊戲中有些物品只能從限定來源取得，這類底材可能很有價值。
Some veiled items, like 'Elreon's Veil' tend to be expensive every league. It should be noted that the natural unveil can be very powerful and is stronger than the crafted version of the mod.
有些迷霧物品，例如「艾爾隆之幕」，在每個賽季初都相當昂貴。需注意的是，自然解鎖的迷霧詞綴威力強大，比工藝的版本更強。
Veiled mods can be 'unveiled' by Jun and become permanent mods + you learn to craft that mod. Member-Specific and small veiled items receive extra highlight!
迷霧詞綴可透過 Jun 解鎖，變成永久詞綴，同時您也會學到該詞綴的工藝。成員限定和小型迷霧物品會額外篩選顯示！
Note that this system is not designed to drop and pricecheck items. It's mostly useful for maps with sextants, corruptions and similar things.
請注意，此系統並非用於掉落和價格檢查物品。它主要用於具有六分儀、腐化等效果的地圖。
The filter also CAN'T check mod ranges, implicit mods, corruptions, enchantments, unique mods or the mods of unidentified items.
過濾器也 *無法* 檢查詞綴範圍、隱性詞綴、腐化、附魔、傳奇詞綴或未鑑定物品的詞綴。

The filer analyzes the mods of identified rare gear pieces and highlights expensive combinations. This process doesn't work with influenced gear, implicits and enchantments. It's not perfect and may sometimes pick up check combinations, but the items highlighted this way can sometimes be quite valuable.
過濾器會分析已鑑定稀有裝備的詞綴，並篩選顯示昂貴的組合。此過程不適用於受勢力影響的裝備、隱性詞綴和附魔。此功能並不完美，有時會選到不佳的組合，但以這種方式篩選顯示的物品有時可能非常珍貴。
具有顯性詞綴 [[ 8 個條目 ]]
具有顯性詞綴 >=2 [[ 15 個條目 ]]
具有顯性詞綴 =0  [[ 10 個條目 ]]
In the first days of new leagues, 5-linked body armors are in fairly high demand. They tend to drop in price rapidly though, as players will gradually switch to using 6-links
新賽季的頭幾天，五連的需求量很高。但隨著玩家逐漸轉為使用六連，價格往往會迅速下跌
Items with 5 linked sockets are useful and valuable early on in the leagues. If they're also 6-socketed, they get the grey recipe background.
具有五連插槽的物品在賽季初期非常有用且珍貴。如果它們同時具有六個插槽，則會獲得灰色配方背景。
珠寶匠配方 6 插槽 - 5 連
Stygian vises can sockets an 'Abyss Jewel'. It's arguably the best belt basetype for most builds and is a great crafting base on high item levels.
可以鑲嵌「深淵珠寶」。它堪稱大多數流派的最佳腰帶底材，也是高物品等級時很好的工藝底材。
練等 - 藥劑 - 生命值
練等 - 藥劑 - 魔力值
練等 - 藥劑 - 複合
While leveling: the current (for that zone) top tier life/mana/hybrid flasks will receive a red/blue/purple border. Upgrade these regularly.
練等時：目前（對於該區域）頂級的生命/魔力/複合藥劑將會收到紅色/藍色/紫色的邊框。定期升級這些藥劑。
練等 - 藥劑 - 功能性
Utility flasks can be highly useful, by providing speed, resistances and defenses and other stats. These flasks are marked by a easily distinguishable green-gray background.
功能藥劑可能非常有用，因為它們可提供速度、抗性、防禦力和其他屬性。這些藥劑以易於區分的綠灰色背景標記。
Good Melee, Archer and Caster rares (especially weapons) are signalized using the red, green and blue backgrounds and borders while leveling. Note that this is not available on certain styles.
在練等時，良好的近戰、弓箭手和法術的稀有物品（尤其是武器）會使用紅色、綠色和藍色背景及邊框表示。請注意，某些樣式無法使用此功能。
練等 魔法/普通 四連
4-linked items are very useful at the start. They're highlighted by a blue-ish border.
四連物品在遊戲初期非常有用，並以藍色邊框篩選顯示。
3-linked items are highlighted during the first 2-3 acts of the campaign with a teal-ish border.
在遊戲劇情的前 2-3 章節中，三連物品以青色邊框篩選顯示。
早期練等鞋子 物品等級 12

The filter has several dozens of rules, such as early jewellery, boots, top basetypes (for a quick essence/transmute-slam) to assist you while leveling. Not every item is going to be useful for everyone and we recommend to customize your filter for the best experience.
過濾器有數十條規則，例如早期珠寶、靴子、頂級底材（用於快速精髓/轉化），以協助您在練等時。並非每個物品都對所有人都有用，因此我們建議您自訂過濾器以獲得最佳體驗。
早期練等靴 物品等級 12
Sixlinks are quite rare and often useful and valuable drops. They can also be sold to the vendor for 20 fusings. Only uncorrupted body armours receive the white background.
六連非常稀有，而且通常是有用且有價值的掉落物。它們也可以以 20 個鏈結石的價格賣給供應商。只有未腐化的身甲才會收到白色背景。
Very special items that drop from specific locations, such as heist trinkets and voidstones, are referred to as artifacts.
從特定地點掉落的非常特殊的物品，例如劫盜飾品和虛空石，被稱為古物。
Unique pseudo-map items like heist contracts, blueprints and expedition logbooks have 2 different tiers of highlight.
獨特的劫盜契約、藍圖和探險日誌，具有 2 個不同等級的篩選顯示。
Splinters are used to create map-like objects such as breachstones, simulacrums and legion map keys. The filter has specific sections to highlight stacks of them in a different way as well.
碎片用於創建類似地圖的物件，例如裂痕石、15層和五軍。過濾器具有特定的章節來以不同的方式篩選顯示它們的堆疊。
裂痕碎片和戰亂碎片 T1
裂痕碎片和戰亂碎片 T2
Endgame currency drops are evaluated based on their stacksize based on the ingame economy. Large stacks get a stronger highlight!
終局通貨掉落物根據遊戲內經濟評估其堆疊數量。 大型堆疊獲得更強的篩選顯示！
堆疊通貨 - 低供應量 大型
堆疊通貨 - 低供應量 中型
堆疊通貨 - 低供應量 小型
Lower currencies dropping in bulk receive a different highlight and are shown differently depending on the strictness.
大量掉落的較低等級通貨會收到不同的篩選顯示，並且根據嚴格程度以不同的方式顯示。
堆疊通貨 - 智慧 大型
堆疊通貨 - 智慧 中型
堆疊通貨 - 智慧 小型
Scrolls dropping in bulk receive a different highlight and are shown differently depending on the strictness.
大量掉落的捲軸會收到不同的篩選顯示，並且根據嚴格程度以不同的方式顯示。
Scarabs add and modify encounters in maps. They come in different rarities and values. A lot of endgame strategies revolve around specific scarab combinations.
聖甲蟲會在地圖中新增和修改遭遇。它們具有不同的稀有度和價值。許多終局策略都圍繞著特定的聖甲蟲組合。
Incubators are commonly found in legion encounters and provide a certain rewards upon slaying sufficient monsters.
培育器通常在軍團遭遇中找到，並且在殺死足夠的怪物後提供一定的獎勵。
Oils are usually found during blight encounters. They can be used to annoint a non-connected node on the tree to your amulet, to enchant your rings and to improve blighted maps.
油通常在凋落遭遇中找到。它們可用於在天賦樹上將非連接的節點塗油到您的護身符上，以附魔您的戒指並改善凋落地圖。
Reduced highlight on Uber Plus Strict
在Uber Plus Strict超級嚴格下減少篩選顯示
Incursion vials are rarely dropped at the end of Alva's Temple of Atzoatl. They can be used to upgrade an incursion-specific unique, when used in a T3 sacrifice room. Some can be very pricy.
先驅者之殿藥劑很少在 Alva 的阿茲瓦特神殿的末端掉落。它們可用於在 T3 犧牲室中使用時升級先驅聯盟特定的傳奇物品。有些可能非常昂貴。
Fossils are originally found in the Azurite mine and can be used together with resonators to craft items with certain affinities.
化石最初是在阿茲瑞特礦坑中發現的，可以與共振器一起使用，來製作具有特定傾向的物品。
Resonators are outfitted with fossils for crafting. Mostly found behind crystal walls in the azurite mine (the ones that you destroy with dynamite)
共振器配備了化石用於工藝。主要在阿茲瑞特礦坑中水晶牆後發現（用炸藥摧毀的那些）
深淵可插槽通貨共振器 T2
Sanctum forbidden tomes. Valuable, especially early on. Run by specialized players early on for good chances of dropping pure Divines.
在早期有很好的機會掉落神聖石。
Idols are only available in 'Phrecia'-custom league as an atlas alternative.
魔偶僅在 'Phrecia'-自訂聯盟中作為輿圖替代品提供。
